alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 11 at 8:32AM MST until February 11 at 9:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southwestern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 900 AM MST. * At 831 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located over Rapid Valley, or 5 miles east of Rapid City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 51 and 69. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Rapid Valley, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Black Hawk, Summerset, Caputa, Farmingdale, Rapid City Airport and Black Gap. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
